Postac:ImmortalShieldBow.NAME: Immortal ShieldBow
Postac:ImmortalShieldBow.FLAVOR: Death is like the wind, always by my side.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once a fight, when you lose HP, gain 7 block and 7 block next turn.

Postac:Zephyr.NAME: Zephyr
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat, apply 1 airborne to every enemy.

Postac:DeathsDance.NAME: Death's Dance
Postac:DeathsDance.FLAVOR: Reminder of long and painful death.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once a turn, when you use tempest, gain 1 Dexterity.

Postac:RavenousHydra.NAME: Ravenous Hydra
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play attack card, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.

Postac:StatikkShiv.NAME: Statikk Shiv
DESCRIPTIONS: When you use cut, gain 1 temporary strength.

Postac:WitsEnd.NAME: Wit's End
DESCRIPTIONS: For first 5 cards played every round, gain 1 block, if you play 5 cards, gain 5 block next turn

Postac:SilvermereDawn.NAME: Silvermere Dawn
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, when you use card with smash, heal 4 HP.

Postac:InfinityEdge.NAME: Infinity Edge
DESCRIPTIONS: Once a combat, when you activate flanked card, gain 1 energy.

Postac:SerpentsFang.NAME: Serpent's Fang
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat gain 1 Impatience

Postac:GuinsoosRageBlade.NAME: Guinsoos Rageblade
DESCRIPTIONS: When you have 15 Damage Next Turn at the end of your turn, gain 2 impatience.

Postac:Bloodthirster.NAME: Bloodthirster
DESCRIPTIONS: Once a combat, when you activate below effect, gain 1 energy.
